name: Gob's Program
short_description:
How to use Gob's Program:

Press y and press Enter.

Then you will see a lot of "Penus" text repeating endlessly. The only to stop it is close the Gob's Program.

Changelog:

1.07

Added support for DOS
Added Gob's Program source code for DOS
Added readme_source_dos.txt
Updated readme.txt
Changed screen style to 13 (See code, DOS only)

1.05

Updated penus.exe icon
Colored text to light green in penus.exe
The Y/N is now case-insensitive. Upper case Y and lower case y will work.
Updated readme.txt and readme_source.txt

1.01:

Added penus.exe icon
Added changelog.txt (This file)
Removed shortcut file and icon
Updated info after installation
Changed installer .exe icon

1.0:

First release
summary: Gob's Program is a program that repeats "Penus" text repeatedly.
